title: BC端的变量
author: 薯片片片片
txt_content: 如题，比如显示各子服人数的变量

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
安装bungee变量拓展 https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/bungeecord/

变量是%bungee_子服名称%  显示总人数的是%bungee_total%

replies.author: fred2006
replies.txt_content:
